name: color-claim-sass
description: SASS color library, based on Tobias van Schneider's Color Claim. http://www.vanschneider.com/colors/

scripts.build: node-sass --include-path scss scss/colorclaim.scss css/colorclaim.css && node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path scss scss/colorclaim.scss css/colorclaim.min.css

author: Jeroen Peeters <contact@jeroenpeeters.me>
